news.title: Skadoodle to take a break from competitive Counter-Strike
news.description: Tyler "Skadoodle" Latham is one of the most seasoned North American CS:GO pros, with a career spanning nearly four years in Cloud9 alone.

news.title: 2018 World Championship Playoff brackets drawn
news.description: Following the conclusion of Group D's matches, Riot Games oversaw the drawing of the 2018 League of Legends World Championship's brackets for the playoff stage.

news.title: Gambit 2019 open to transfer negotiations for AdreN
news.description: Gambit Esports have been the subject of disbandment rumours in recent times, particularly after a poor showing at the FACEIT Major - London 2018

news.title: G2 first to receive direct invite to $100,000 PLG Grand Slam
news.description: G2 Esports were the first CS:GO roster to confirm participation at the LAN finals of the PLG Grand Slam, which is taking place on Dec.

news.title: Zikz joins Team SoloMid as head coach
news.description: Zikz's achievements as CLG's head coach and his work garnered respect among North American LCS peers and commentators, a matter that caused the majority to react with surprise

news.title: Fnatic Broxah after outplaying Ning, beats Invictus Gaming
news.description: I am really really happy and excited to not only go to quarterfinals but also to go as first seed.
